face.transformationDescription:

[npc.Name] now [npc.has] a [style.boldHyena(spitbug face)], with [npc.pussyColourPrimary(true)] labia and [npc.pussyColourSecondary(true)] internal walls, [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription].
face.bodyDescriptionFeral: [npc.SheHasFull] the [npc.feminineDescriptor(true)] face of a feral [npc.legRace], which is [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription(true)] and complete with a face vagina.
